name: Ethereal Envoy - prototype
description:
Wander through mysterious primordial forest as a sprite Rarach who uses the form of an ethereal sphere to travel. Take advantage of every downhill to nimbly traverse great distances and discover the secrets of the forest along the way.

This prototype is intended for gathering early feedback on basic gameplay. The demo takes around 10 minutes. After the demo ends (or in the pause menu), you can open Google Docs questionnaire which is the best way to provide your feedback. Thank you. 

If you send me your recorded playthrough I will be happy to include you in the credits as a playtester.

Known issues:

  • contains some placeholder textures, voice over, effects etc.
  • only basic artpass at the second half of the demo
  • there might be bugs, but hopefully nothing major ^.^

Made with Unity 2021.
